Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.medicalservice.Messages.controllers.MessageController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/messages")
public class MessageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class responsible for handling message-related HTTP requests.

        @PostMapping(value="/sendMessage")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> sendMessage(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                 MessageEO messageEO)
        Sends a message using the provided message entity.
        Parameters:
        messageEO - The message entity containing sender, receiver, and message content.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with a success or error message.

      • receiveMessage

        @PostMapping(value="/receiveMessage")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> receiveMessage(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                       MessageEO messageEO)
        Receives messages using the provided message entity.
        Parameters:
        messageEO - The message entity containing sender and receiver information.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with received messages or an error message.

      • getQueueSize

        @PostMapping(value="/getQueueSize")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Integer> getQueueSize(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                    MessageEO messageEO)
        Retrieves the size of a message queue using the provided message entity.
        Parameters:
        messageEO - The message entity containing sender and receiver information.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with the size of the queue or an error message.
